1448299214417678336.text:
🧑‍💻We consider each release "production ready", and take great care to make sure there are no gaps or problems.

🚀With the last few releases, we have had working code to help us evaluate the changes during the process, with a working implementation avilable on the day of release!

1448299212345589766.text:
😮Did you know, we're not an "IETF standard"?

💭We are considering self publishing new versions of JSON Schema as opposed to using IETF personal drafts.

😎This would also mean dropping the "draft" prefix from our release version identifier.

https://t.co/TBfc7wYgbQ

- Track important decisions even in the proposal stage
- Have a point of reference for decisions
- Keep records of considerations and those involved

Think this sounds good? Or maybe not so good?

Please voice your opinions or reactions.
